title: Interstitium (Band)
subtitle:
Global release. 'When the Boat Went Down' 2019 vers. by INTERSTITIUM. Wikipedia: "In 2018, the United Nations est. the number of forcibly displaced people to be 68.5 million worldwide... One in every 113 people globally is an asylum seeker or a refugee."
https://www.reverbnation.com/Interstitium/song/19891264-when-boat-went-down-2019-version …pic.twitter.com/HpgEm3XE43

title: Michael Bowen
subtitle: Impossible - 400,000 estimated killed !! Atrocities - 4 million people displaced !! Crackdown on Protesters, Arbitrary Detentions, Torture, Sexual Violence, No Freedom of Religion, chronic Refugee issues & KIDS ARE DISPOSABLE !! No way forward?? BACK FRANCIS!! pic.twitter.com/34BjKQ3oJp

title: RACSurgeons
subtitle:
RACS Fellow Munjed Al Muderis fled war-torn Iraq to Australia as a refugee by boat, spent months in a detention centre before becoming a pioneering surgeon. 

Read the e-book version of Walking Free (2014) via the #RACSLibrary at: http://bit.ly/2Ok6Lxo pic.twitter.com/e6W16vFA5d

title: Rod Emmerson
subtitle: The 2016 cartoon I did supporting cartoonist @realEatenFish now free from Manus Is. Today the voice of Manus Is @BehrouzBoochani Iranian journalist & refugee, detained for 6 yrs on Manus, has been granted a visa and is now in NZ to speak ⁦at @WORDChCh. Well done NZ!pic.twitter.com/xXVVsp7zzh

title: Dr Melanie O'Brien
subtitle: The #quilt exhibition was interspersed with paintings; I assume these are painted by #Rohingya #refugees, as expressions of their experience & loss. I found these two particularly poignant. #genocide #artpic.twitter.com/e1aNgjHDPz

title: Brad Chilcott
subtitle:
“Community sponsorship is one area you can make progress even in an atmosphere of rising hostility and insecurity”

Cool to hang with my friend @dixontim in Cork and hear him share what he’s learned about community attitudes to people seeking asylum and refugees. pic.twitter.com/5jXjuHgmT8

title: cohealth
subtitle: Our Shared Humanity, a collection of 20 creative works by artists from refugee and asylum seeker backgrounds will be on exhibition during #OneNightInFootscray. More information > http://bit.ly/oursharedhumanity …pic.twitter.com/B7b5oCvnUF

title: East Asia Forum
subtitle: Bangladesh is in an untenable position caught between its neighbours majoritarian impulses. Bangladesh continues to host a large Rohingya refugee population from Myanmar while India threatens to deport Bengali Muslims from Assam #Bangladesh #Myanmar #India https://buff.ly/2Qd2a12 pic.twitter.com/OfbpACRUqe

title: Brad Chilcott
subtitle: With the Aussie contingent in Cork, Ireland - @CarmenGhaly, @LisaButton2067 and I explaining the opportunities and challenges for community refugee sponsorship in Australia @theGRSI Community Sponsorship Champions Summit #MyNewNeighbourpic.twitter.com/cxKRyuCzG4

title: Swathi
subtitle: On relationships..."in some religions relationships are not allowed..but it's not just refugee and migrant communities...when we were in the refugee camp a nun helping my mum told her that kids shouldn't be in relationships and to not let us watch The Simpsons because it's rude" pic.twitter.com/mc8V2MLSPG

title: Brad Chilcott
subtitle: Fantastic to be in Cork, Ireland with refugee advocates and settlement practitioners from around the world for @theGRSI Community Sponsorship Champions Summit. Great people from as far as Argentina, Brazil, NZ, Canada, US and all over Europe.pic.twitter.com/Bn9PBkNkxg

title: WEFTshop
subtitle:
What I love about our beautiful hand loomed Mie Meh Shawl is how they can be a light and soft shawl and then in the winter a rich full scarf. Only x4 of these beautiful pieces available woven by our talented artisans in Karenni refugee camp.
Limited edit… https://ift.tt/33GM5EE pic.twitter.com/Gh3rul1lzu

title: Martin O'Brien
subtitle: Winners!St Anthony’s take home Yr 5-6 Pairs gong @ #premierscodingchallenge. I mentored the Yr6 Ss on app design, UI & UX. One team member also from one of our Syrian refugee families - so proud of their grit & determination! #coding #educhat #AppleEDUchat #edtechpic.twitter.com/wQbx5Yu9TO – at Ferny Grove State High School

title: Australia for UNHCR
subtitle:
It's Week 2 of the 2 Billion Kilometres to Safety campaign and Australians have already taken over 7.4 million steps in solidarity with refugees! Check out some of our amazing steppers ​in action. Great work!

It’s not too late to join us. Register now  …https://2billionkmstosafety.blackbaud-sites.com/ pic.twitter.com/gkQQ3I8eVX

title: TEDxCanberra
subtitle: At ‘TEDx CanberraWomen 2019', we’re shining a spotlight on ideas from Canberra’s most extraordinary innovators & we're excited to announce Sophie Fisher as a speaker! She's the Founder of Girls on Bikes, which mobilises & connects migrant & refugee women: https://girlsonbikesact.com.au pic.twitter.com/Hf8irgpUKa

title: 7NEWS Toowoomba
subtitle: Residents in Tarome are being urged to be prepared to leave, with QFES advising that bushfire conditions could change quickly. A refugee for horses has been set up at Boonah Showgrounds, 8 Melbourne Street. http://7news.link/N60K6j  #qldweather #7NEWSpic.twitter.com/OlrZNhoaC3
